data.name: Jumping Platform Minigame
data.detailed_description:
This game was created with Unity based on the Unity "Platformer Microgame" project

Jumping Platform Minigame is a 2D platform game in which you have to collect diamonds and kill small mushrooms.

- 10 Levels
- You can play with the keyboard and the joystick

Controls
- A-D or arrow keys / left analog stick (move the player)
- Space / button "A" xbox (jump)
- Esc / button "start" xbox (pause game)

NOTE : Don't use the joystick in the game menu (controls / credits), the player doesn't jump anymore.
NOTE : Don't use the Steam overlay unless you pause the game first.

GOOD FUN !!!

data.short_description: Jumping Platform Minigame is a 2D platform game in which you have to collect diamonds and kill small mushrooms.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz (Intel i3-3217U)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
